title: PATCH 6.7 problem

replies.body:
Hey there,

Definitely sounds like a potential connection issue, could you try some of the fixes outlined in [this support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if anything helps.
Nothing worked much. I did a pc update and unistall the game then  reinstalled it and it worked. Took me around 4 hours for a patch.

Hello,

Please try some of the solutions in this Riot Support Article. If that doesn't work come back and I'll give you a few more tricks I have.

Good Luck,
PRIMAl
